overview: “NFTs: Enter the Metaverse,” an ABC Owned Television Stations documentary and ABC Localish Studios production takes you inside the gold-rush-like hysteria surrounding NFTs.  Artists, celebrities, and global business icons — all attempting to cash-in on the craze that’s sweeping the world. But wait one hot minute... are NTFs the future or just a phase?
title: NFTs: Enter the Metaverse
